message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a generous offer considering I'm starting the game. Let's not waste time with further rounds and risk losing money to inflation.
Alice, considering the 20% inflation, I think 55/45 is a fair split. We should take this before the money devalues further.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise with a 52/48 split.  Another round of inflation will only hurt us both. This is my final offer.
